title: Russia Says Ukraine's EU Membership 'Hardly Real' Possibility
description: In the Kremlin's first public reaction, President Vladimir Putin's spokesman said: "Most likely, we are talking about a carrot being dangled in front of a cart, so to speak."
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: In Russia-Occupied Sievierodonetsk, War Still Scars Everyday Life
description: “It used to be a very beautiful city,” said one resident who stayed when Russian troops arrived. “Now, there's no more life.”
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia
album: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: EU Lawmakers Call for Ban on Russian LNG
description: But there seems to be little appetite across the bloc to impose a ban that could further roil Europe's fragile gas markets and drive up energy prices.

title: Putin to Hold Call-In Show, Annual Press Conference in 'Combined Format'

title: Russia Dismisses Claims It Ordered Paris Stars of David Graffiti
description: "It's stupid, utter rubbish and just plain undignified," Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova said when asked about accusations of a Russian link.

title: Russian Police Detain Kazakh National Working as Journalist in Ural Mountains
description: Vladislav Ivanenko, who has lived and worked in Perm for the past eight years, was told Thursday that his Russian residency permit was revoked.

title: Crimean Private Clinics Stop Providing Abortion Services
description: The annexed region’s private clinics decided to stop providing abortion services following a meeting with state officials and representatives from the Russian Orthodox Church.

title: Moscow ‘Shocked’ by Timeline To Evacuate Russians From Gaza
description: Israel's envoy to Moscow told Russian state media this week that it could take two weeks to get Russian citizens out of the besieged Gaza Strip.
artist: The Moscow Times - Independent News From Russia

title: Ukraine Says Calls for Talks With Russia 'Uninformed or Misled'
description: Ukraine's Foreign Minister Dmytro Kuleba said Kyiv held hundreds of rounds of talks with Moscow after 2014, but none prevented the outbreak of war.

title: Putin Offers Way for Russians to 'Swap' Frozen Assets
description: According to the Kremlin, more than $16 billion worth of foreign investments belonging to Russian citizens are now stuck abroad.
